location.name: Black Path Territory
location.description: Criminal underworld region where martial artists of the dark path gather

variation.name: alley_day
variation.description: Dark alleyway during daytime, still shadowy

generation.prompt:
Korean webtoon background illustration:
- Location: Black Path Territory (흑도 (黑道))
- Setting: Dark alleyway during daytime, still shadowy
- View: exterior view

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
Dark, narrow alleyways, Seedy establishments and taverns, Dangerous atmosphere with hidden threats, Crowded streets with shadowy figures, Traditional architecture in disrepair, Dim lantern lighting

ATMOSPHERE:
- Mood: Dangerous, seedy, tense, lawless
- Lighting: Warm oil lamp or candle lighting
- Color Temperature: 2700K (warm)
- Shadow Intensity: High (dramatic)

STYLE REQUIREMENTS:
- Art style: Korean webtoon (manhwa), wuxia genre
- Clean detailed linework, cel-shaded with gradient accents
- Color emphasis: #1a1a2e, #4a4a6a, #8b0000, #333333
- High detail environment art, publication ready
- No characters, environment only
- No text or UI elements

COMPOSITION:
- Wide establishing shot
- Depth and atmosphere emphasized
- Appropriate atmospheric effects

QUALITY: High detail, 2K resolution quality, professional illustration
